content: should http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-medication-statement-status.html have name "Medication Statement Status Codes"? currently it is "Medication Status Codes", which collides with http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-medication-status.html
happy to file a task if you think so
For discussion : this seems to be not the statement status, but the treatment status.
("treatment" is one of those words I think we missed in the beginning but is essential to differentiate the event -a statement - and the thing it refers to. )
There is discussion in the Pharmacy Group about the current status and what it should be - it is a mix of record status vs treatment status that needs to be resolved.
